bilingual.target: 过多的网络流量可能会导致网络延迟。

bilingual.source: We need a network analyzer to detect network issues.
bilingual.target: 我们需要一个网络分析仪来检测网络问题。

bilingual.source: A network analyzer can help us optimize network performance.
bilingual.target: 网络分析仪可以帮助我们优化网络性能。

bilingual.source: With a network analyzer, we can monitor all network activities.
bilingual.target: 通过网络分析仪，我们可以监控所有的网络活动。

bilingual.source: Understanding different network protocols is important for network engineers.
bilingual.target: 了解不同的网络协议对于网络工程师很重要。

bilingual.source: We have a wireless network at home.
bilingual.target: 我们家里有一个无线网络。
使用简单网络管理协议来监控网络设备。
这个网络覆盖了整个城市。
传输控制／网际协议是一种常见的 网络协议。

list.abstract: network，英语单词，名词，意思是“网络；广播网；网状物”。

yingyinNormal.en: That was the beginning of the Angel Network.
yingyinNormal.zh: 天使网络便从那时开始运作了。

yingyinNormal.en: You're watching the top secret Villain Network Channel.
yingyinNormal.zh: 您正在收看的是绝密恶人网络电视台。

yingyinNormal.en: What do you mean? It's not an underground network. John. It's an underground network.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的意思是? 不是地下网络，约翰，是地下网络。

yingyinNormal.en: It's more connections than the human brain. Get it? It's a network. It's a global network, and the Na'vi can access it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这比人类的大脑更复杂，明白吗？这是个网络，整个星球的网络，纳威族能通过这个网络。

yingyinNormal.en: So, the Angel Network, I've been on the air for a long time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 天使网络的想法在我心中萦绕已久。

yingyinNormal.en: Now this little bastard hacks into anything that's on a digital network.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个小混蛋黑了数字网络里的所有东西。

yingyinNormal.en: But it was the Angel Network that actually focused my internal GPS.
yingyinNormal.zh: 正是天使网络让我确定了心中的那个导航仪。

yingyinNormal.en: A social network is something that has its roots firmly planted in our history.
yingyinNormal.zh: 社交网络深深植根于我们的历史当中。

yingyinNormal.en: I hear the freshmen just joined the high school social network. Not me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我听说你们这些新生加入高中社交网络了。我没有。

yingyinNormal.en: We possess a gigantic network of information to which we have almost no access.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们拥有庞大的信息网络却几乎没有在使用。

yingyinNormal.en: So you all have the power in your own way to develop your own Angel Network.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因此，你们每个人都有能力打造自己的天使网络项目。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you know anything about wireless network architecture? A bit. I think you'll find I'm a quick study.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你懂无线网络线路结构吗？略懂，我上手很快。

yingyinNormal.en: You know me sir. Oh, I do have a question for you. Do you know how I get around the office computer network so I can access the really good Internet porn?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你很了解我的，老板，你知道要怎么避过办公室的电脑网络，进去网际网络看超级精彩的黄色电影吗？

yingyinNormal.en: According to Mycroft, there's an underground network planning an attack on London. That's all we know.
yingyinNormal.zh: 麦克罗夫特说的，地下网络要袭击伦敦，就这点消息。

yingyinNormal.en: Khan's antiviral software comes pre-installed in 86% of the network devices now sold around the globe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可汗的杀毒软件目前预装在全世界86%的网络设备上。

yingyinNormal.en: Any idea who they are, this underground network? Intelligence must have a list of the most obvious ones.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谁的地下网络，你有头绪吗? 情报局一定有重点嫌疑名单。

yingyinNormal.en: No, no, no, she doesn't want that. She needs a point-to-point peer network with a range extender. Thank you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，她不需要那个，她需要一个扩大范围的点对点网络。谢谢你。

yingyinNormal.en: As soon as she hangs up, Debra begins juggling this network's limited airspace to keep traffic flowing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她挂断电话后，黛布拉开始继续在这个网络受限的空间游走，保持空中交通顺畅。

yingyinNormal.en: The network of angels sitting here today. One of them, Khadijah Williams, who came to Harvard four years ago.
yingyinNormal.zh: 天使网络的天使们就坐在这里，其中的一位，赫蒂彻·威廉姆斯，她四年前来到了哈佛大学。

yingyinNormal.en: So, this Angel Network, it didn't just change the lives of those who were helped, but the lives of those who also did the helping.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因此，对于天使网络而言，它并不只会改变那些得到帮助的人，也会改变那些施予帮助的人。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 网状物；网状系统；人际网；网络；交通网络；广播网；网路
n. 无挡板篮球比赛；篮球

word_family.mean: n. 网；罗网；网子；网状物；网眼织物；圈套；陷阱；网络

sense_info_list.en: a system of computers connected by communications lines

examination_example.sentence: It needs to give the commission explicit authority to bar broadband providers from meddling in the traffic on their <highlight>network</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它需要赋予欧盟委员会明确的权力，禁止宽带提供商干预其网络流量。

examination_example.sentence: It is expensive to set up the computer, card reader, and telecommunications <highlight>networks</highlight> necessary to make electronic money the dominant form of payment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了使电子货币成为主要的支付方式，必须建立计算机、读卡器和电信网络，这是非常昂贵的。

examination_example.sentence: Second, the majority of people who use <highlight>networked</highlight> computers to upload are not even aware of the significance of what they are doing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其次，大多数使用联网电脑上传的人甚至没有意识到他们所做的事情的重要性。

sense_info_list.en: a complex system of roads, railroads, or other transportation routes

examination_example.sentence: The cost of travelling by train rises, imposing a significant extra burden on those who use the rail <highlight>network</highlight> to get to work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 乘火车旅行的成本上升，给那些使用铁路网上班的人带来了巨大的额外负担。

examination_example.sentence: It is all very well train operators trumpeting the improvements they are making to the <highlight>network</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 列车运营者大肆宣扬他们对铁路网的改进是非常好的。

examination_example.sentence: Amazon.com, with its <highlight>network</highlight> of warehouses, also collects sales tax in every state that charges it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 亚马逊凭借其仓库网，也在每个向其收费的州征收销售税。

sense_info_list.en: an arrangement of things forming a pattern with spaces between

examination_example.sentence: This will help to grow your internal <highlight>network</highlight>, in addition to being a nice break in the work day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这将有助于发展你的内部关系网，除此之外，也是一个不错的工作日休息时间。

examination_example.sentence: It is harmful to our <highlight>networks</highlight> of friends.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这对我们的朋友圈有害。

examination_example.sentence: An emerging body of research shows that positive health habits spread through <highlight>networks</highlight> of friends via social communication.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近大量的研究表明，良好的卫生习惯通过社交在朋友圈中传播。

sense_info_list.en: an arrangement of intersecting horizontal and vertical lines

exam_freq_info.chinese: 关系网; 人际网; 建立关系

数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>

由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 网状物；网状系统；人际网；网络；交通网络；广播网；网路

word_family.mean: n. 网；罗网；网子；网状物；网眼织物；圈套；陷阱；网络

sense_info_list.en: a system of computers connected by communications lines

examination_example.sentence: Social <highlight>networks</highlight>, though, have since colonized the web for television's values.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不过，社交网络从此为电视的价值开拓了网络。

examination_example.sentence: A global campaign has been launched to create a <highlight>network</highlight> of ocean sanctuaries to protect the seas in the region.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一项旨在建立海洋保护区网络以保护该地区海洋的全球运动已经启动。

sense_info_list.en: an arrangement of things forming a pattern with spaces between
sense_info_list.zh: 关系网; 人际网; 建立关系

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Network</highlight> with his close friends to find a better employer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与他的密友建立联系，寻找更好的雇主。

examination_example.sentence: There is always the chance that it could affect my reputation and my ability to <highlight>network</highlight> in the industry.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它总是有可能影响我的声誉和我在该行业的人脉能力。

sense_info_list.en: a complex system of roads, railroads, or other transportation routes

examination_example.sentence: Others opted to lie, and they showed increased activity in their frontal parietal (颅腔壁的) control <highlight>network</highlight>, which is involved in difficult or complex thinking.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其他选择撒谎的人，他们颅腔壁的控制网络活动增加，这涉及到困难且复杂的思维。

examination_example.sentence: They showed increased activity in their frontal parietal (颅腔壁的) control <highlight>network</highlight>, which is involved in difficult or complex thinking.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的前额叶控制网络显示活动增加，这就意味着人脑在进行困难或复杂的思考。

sense_info_list.en: an arrangement of intersecting horizontal and vertical lines

examination_example.sentence: That is why being self- aware, investing in broader <highlight>networks</highlight> of friends, and being open to new ideas will become even more crucial skills.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这就是为什么了解自己，投资更广人脉，并乐于接受新思想这些技能将会变得更加重要。

examination_example.sentence: The land has been connected to the <highlight>network</highlight> of lakes and streams in the area.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这片陆地与该地区的湖泊和溪流相连。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 网状物；网状系统；人际网；网络；交通网络；广播网；网路

word_family.mean: n. 网；罗网；网子；网状物；网眼织物；圈套；陷阱；网络

sense_info_list.en: an arrangement of things forming a pattern with spaces between

examination_example.sentence: The result was Project Wild Thing, a film which charts the birth of the Wild <highlight>Network</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其结果是《野生动物计划》，这部电影描绘了野生网络的诞生。

examination_example.sentence: By creating a <highlight>network</highlight> of friends.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过建立一个朋友网络。

examination_example.sentence: Interactions with peripheral (边缘的) members of our social <highlight>network</highlight> matter for our well-being .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与社会网络边缘成员的互动，会影响我们的幸福感。

sense_info_list.en: a system of computers connected by communications lines

examination_example.sentence: Today his hobby has developed into the website postcrossing.com, a social <highlight>network</highlight> that has grown to 575,217 registered users.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，他的爱好已经发展成为“postcrossing.com”网站，一个注册用户已达到575，217人的社交网络。

examination_example.sentence: Teresa posted a photo of the chance meeting on a social <highlight>networking</highlight> website accompanied by the touching words.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 特蕾莎在社交网站上发布了这次偶遇的照片，并配以感人的文字。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 关系网; 人际网; 建立关系

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 网状物；网状系统；人际网；网络；交通网络；广播网；网路

word_family.mean: n. 网；罗网；网子；网状物；网眼织物；圈套；陷阱；网络

sense_info_list.en: a system of computers connected by communications lines

examination_example.sentence: 5G is the 5th generation <highlight>network</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 5G是第五代网络。

examination_example.sentence: 5G <highlight>networks</highlight> will cover many cities in China soon.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 5G网络将很快覆盖中国的许多城市。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>network</highlight> is expected to double in length again, to 70,000 kilometers, by 2035.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 预计到2035年，该网络的长度将翻倍，达到70000公里。

sense_info_list.en: an arrangement of things forming a pattern with spaces between
sense_info_list.zh: 关系网; 人际网; 建立关系

examination_example.sentence: Learning makes our neuronal <highlight>networks</highlight> grow.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学习让我们的神经元网络成长。

examination_example.sentence: The more neuronal <highlight>networks</highlight> we grow, the better we can think and the better we remember.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们生长的神经元网络越多，我们就能更好地思考和记忆。

examination_example.sentence: You may wonder if there is anything you can do to make the <highlight>networks</highlight> in your brain grow better.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可能想知道你是否可以做些什么来让你的大脑网络生长得更好。
